Package com.sanderjurgens.volvis.visualization

Class Visualization

java.lang.Object
com.sanderjurgens.volvis.visualization.Visualization
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jogamp.opengl.GLEventListener, EventListener
public final class Visualization extends Object implements com.jogamp.opengl.GLEventListener
Class in charge of updating the visualization, partially based on the selected renderer.
Author:
sanderjurgens
